attributes.action: Take account of the overall environmental cost of motor vehicles...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Take account of the true overall environmental cost of motor vehicles, not just that of fuel consumption / exhaust emissions which are but a small percentage of this cost.  This should include all vehicles, including  electric cars (e.g. the inefficiencies of using batteries as a power storage medium and the requirements of generating the power to recharge them, plus the serious environmental damage that has been caused by the use of nickel in battery manufacture).
